name: 1-for-1 movie tickets at Shaw Theatres
description: Enjoy one-for-one movie tickets at Shaw Theatres from now until 29 September 2024 when you book online using a SAFRA card
details: Only available online and exclusive to SAFRA members. limited to the first 300 redemptions each day.

name: VR space experience
description: Embark on a journey into space and live the life of a NASA astronaut at the world largest immersive 360° VR space experience coming to Singapore in October 2024
location: Annexe Hall 2 & 3, 15 Science Centre Road, Singapore 609081

name: POP Toy Show
description: The POP Toy Show is making a comeback this August 2024 with event-exclusive collectibles, meet-and-greets with over 50 artists and many more for three days only

name: Singapore Night Festival
description: Singapore Night Festival 2024 lights up the Bras Basah.Bugis precinct with night light installations, festival villages, food and retail experiences & more

name: Bubble Planet: An Immersive Experience
description: This multisensory experience is coming to Singapore in August 2024, offering 11 themed areas with a bubble bath ball pit, VR hot air balloon ride, photo spots and more
location: Hall 8B, 1 Expo Drive, #02-01, Singapore EXPO, Singapore 486150
details: 11am–9.30pm (Mon, Wed to Thu), 9am–10.30pm (Fri to Sat), 9am–9.30pm (Sun), Closed on Tue
